summary: Lahore is a big city in Pakistan, known for its rich history and culture. It's the capital of Punjab province and the second largest city in Pakistan. Over 13 million people live there. Lahore has been important for many centuries, serving as the capital of different empires. It was a major city during the Mughal Empire and is now a center for education, literature, and tourism. The city is famous for its beautiful mosques, gardens, and historic sites, like the Walled City and Lahore Fort.
title: Lahore
